caption.p: Network of 493 modern genomes, 15 published ancient strains and 12 newly-discovered ancient strains. Single letters indicate HBV genotypes (Aâ€“H); coloured strains are of ancient origin; OWM = Old-World Monkey HBV strains, NWM = New-World Monkey HBV strains. D: five new ancient strains, six ancient strains [ 43, 44, 45]; C: one ancient strain [ 46]; B: one ancient strain [ 45]; A: two new ancient strains, three ancient strains [ 45]; G: one new ancient strain; OWM: three new ancient strains, four ancient strains [ 44, 45].
